deferred_tasks_security_key_info: Security key is used in order to generate urls that can't be guessed. String should be random.
deferred_tasks_max_number_of_workers_inf: Maximum numbers of tasks that can be executed at the same time
deferred_tasks_insert_line_into_cron: Add next line to your cron file
deferred_tasks_or_use_online_services: or use next url for online cron services
